issue.title: smartcard.apps.coloros.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Trackers)
 [http://smartcard.apps.coloros.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fsmartcard.apps.coloros.com)
### Comment
> Seems to be telemetry for the feature:
> Live alerts
> A dynamic island type function for ColorOS/oxygenOS/realmeUI devices
> 
> 
> Note that the request comes from the app: Ubiquitous Manager Service
> 
> You can also find the APK here. 
> https://www.apkmirror.com/apk/coloros/ubiquitous-manager-service/

### Screenshots

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | Android 13
Browser: | Ubiquitous Manager Service

issue.title: www.mytvsuper.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.mytvsuper.com/tc/live/83/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mytvsuper.com%2Ftc%2Flive%2F83%2F) ### Comment > First you need to use a VPN on this domain https://www.mytvsuper.com, connect the VPN to Hong Kong. > Directly open the live site: https://www.mytvsuper.com/tc/live/83/ > The site does not requires login only if you open it using VPN from Hong Kong, any other country will prompt you to create an account thus you will not be able to test it. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fzz2jdzwx08cogk8sos8k0gc4ks0048swsw7agby2o.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.88 MV3 System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | **General settings**:

Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests Filters: | Ad blocking:
